item.title: ‘Convrge’ is now cross platform with Gear VR and Oculus Rift
item.description:
‘Convrge’ is now cross platform with Gear VR and Oculus Rift

Convrge, the social VR platform known for hosting some of the first large-scale social meetups in virtual reality, has announced signups for a Gear VR beta, which will allow Samsung Gear VR users to mingle and also watch YouTube videos with Oculus Rift DK2 owners.

item.title: ‘Convrge’ Announces Gear VR Beta with Cross-Platform YouTube Viewing
item.description:
‘Convrge’ Announces Gear VR Beta with Cross-Platform YouTube Viewing

Convrge, the social VR platform known for hosting some of the first large-scale social meetups in virtual reality, has announced signups for a Gear VR beta, which will allow Samsung Gear VR users to mingle and also watch YouTube videos with Oculus Rift DK2 owners.
